title: Ep. 28 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: On this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave, Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer discuss Bert's sobriety, the period of time in which people became attractive, and what the two of them are going to do after the quarantine is over. The two of them talk to Ryan Sickler, Dr. Drew Pinsky, and Joey Diaz on the phone. Tom also shares Norman Summerton's poutine video with Bert. What do YOU like on YOUR poutine? Let us know in the comment section below!
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
